name: Goldchemy
description:
Submission for MiniJam 85, following the Gold theme and the 60 second timer limitation.

Grab the ingredients you need with one hand and block the rest with the other. Follow the recipe and throw them into the cauldron before your time runs out. Watch out for the possible reactions that may happen every few seconds, they'll make it harder for you to see what's going on.

Fernando Peral Díaz - Game design, music and programming.
https://twitter.com/ferboid1
Jorge Pons Asensio - Art, game design  support and programming support.
https://twitter.com/TCLDrawings
Rodrigo Cid Colino - Programming.
https://twitter.com/twinArmaged0ns
Pelayo Moure Pérez - Programming.
https://twitter.com/KulakSlayer

Fonts used:

Metal Mania - Open Window - Google Fonts
Lemonada - Mohamed Gaber - Google Fonts

Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com
